action.description:
Introduced by Senators L. Johnson, Drake, Hesselbein, Larson, Spreitzer and Wirch; 
cosponsored by Representatives Madison, Haywood, Moore Omokunde, Arney, Goodwin, Rivera-Wagner, Stubbs, Taylor, Bare, Brown, Clancy, DeSmidt, Fitzgerald, Hong, Joers, Kirsch, Miresse, Phelps, Prado, Roe, Tenorio and Udell
